sentences.en: A point of order was raised in parliament by Mr Ben Morris.
sentences.cn: 本·莫里斯先生在议会就程序问题提出质询。

sentences.en: A roar of approval resounded through the Ukrainian parliament.
sentences.cn: 一片赞成声在乌克兰议会中回响。

sentences.en: Jacques Arnold has been a member of parliament since 1987.
sentences.cn: 雅克·阿诺德自1987年以来一直是议会议员。

sentences.en: Kaifu threatened to dissolve the Parliament and call an election.
sentences.cn: 卡夫威胁要解散议会并举行选举。

sentences.en: Legislation to that effect created fierce controversy both in Parliament and outside.
sentences.cn: 那类立法在议会内外都引起了激烈的争论。

sentences.en: Members of Parliament are spending the weekend canvassing opinion in their constituencies.
sentences.cn: 国会议员这个周末要向所在选区的选民征求意见。

sentences.en: Most members of Parliament took a hard line on this issue.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数议员在这个问题上都持强硬立场。

sentences.en: Parliament returns to work today after its summer recess.
sentences.cn: 国会在结束夏季休会后今天开始恢复工作。

sentences.en: Politicians say it could lead to a dissolution of parliament.
sentences.cn: 政客们说这可能会导致议会解散。

sentences.en: She is to stand as a Member of the European Parliament.
sentences.cn: 她将竞选欧洲议会议员。

sentences.en: Students tried to form a human chain around the parliament.
sentences.cn: 学生们试图在议会四周围成人墙。

sentences.en: The Estonian parliament has passed a resolution declaring the republic fully independent.
sentences.cn: 爱沙尼亚议会已经通过了宣布共和国完全独立的决议。

sentences.en: The legislation is expected to be passed in the next parliament.
sentences.cn: 预计这项法案将在下一届议会中通过。

sentences.en: The parliament described the decree as interference in the republic's internal affairs.
sentences.cn: 议会形容此法令为对共和国内政的干涉。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister has called an emergency meeting of parliament.
sentences.cn: 首相已召集议会召开紧急会议。

sentences.en: They demanded a free parliament and press.
sentences.cn: 他们要求议会自由和新闻自由。

words.tran_cn: 议会的；国会的；议会制度的
国会议员，熟练而又有经验的议员

phrases.tran_cn: 国会议员；下院议员；下议院议员
国会大厦（加拿大标志建筑）

trans.tran_en: the group of people who are elected to make a country’s laws and discuss important national affairs
